LanguageData.Gun_GatlingGun.label: gatling gun
LanguageData.Gun_GatlingGun.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Bullet_GatlingGun.label: gattling bullet
LanguageData.Turret_GatlingGun.label: gatling gun turret
LanguageData.Turret_GatlingGun.description: A portable, old time turret. Needs to be manned in order to be operated. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Firing speed increases the longer this turret fires. May explode when damaged.
